alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 6:56PM CDT until May 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Eastern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Liberal to 3 miles west of Hooker, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Beaver, Hooker, Tyrone, Forgan, Optima, Hardesty, Baker, Adams, Boyd, Mocane, Turpin and Floris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
